name: idp.vim
description: This is a very basic syntax file for the IDP language (http://dtai.cs.kuleuven.be/krr/software/idp)
install_details:
* Install the script by simply placing it in the .vim/syntax directory
* To automatically apply this to .idp files add the following to filetype.vim
au BufRead,BufNewFile *.idp setfiletype idp
